name: rvo-vsts-promotepackage-task
description: Promotes a package to a Release View in VSTS Package Management
author: Rene van Osnabrugge

inputs.helpMarkdown: Name of the output variabele that you want to set. Do not use $(outputVar) but only outputVar
inputs.label: Output variable
inputs.name: outputVarBuildResult

inputs.helpMarkdown: Set a value to set a build tag when the build has changed. Use Tag1;Tag2 format for multiple tags.
inputs.label: Build Tag(s) when build changed
inputs.name: tagsBuildChanged

inputs.helpMarkdown: Set a value to set a build tag when the build has NOT changed. Use Tag1;Tag2 format for multiple tags.
inputs.label: Build Tag(s) when build did not change
inputs.name: tagsBuildNotChanged
